nodes.text: Breyer Chorn was a male Mandalorian warrior at the time of the Eternal Empire's conquest of the galaxy. Breyer was a member of Clan Chorn, and he sported gold and grey Mandalorian armor.

Later, when Mandalore the Avenger rallied the clans against the Eternal Empire, Breyer Chorn and his clan were among those to answer. And during the attack on the Darvannis droid factory, he was assigned the task of attacking the droid factory's shield generator.

Breyer and his clan were first introduced to the Star Wars Legends in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire. When Breyer's task force are outflanked by Skytroopers in Chapter XIV, the player could have the choice of sacrificing or saving him and his comrades.
